name: The Lansdowne Hotel
description:
Fully renovated in May 2017, The Lansdowne Hotel is the perfect Sydney base for the adventure-seeking young traveller. The hostel is located above a lively pub and live music venue, holding shows from different bands throughout the week, right at your doorstep! Across the road you will find Broadway Shopping Centre, for all essentials and shopping needs. Wander up Broadway and you will be at Central Station in minutes, where you can hop on a train or bus to the beach, or continue walking through China Town all the way to the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge. Spend the afternoon relaxing on our sunny rooftop terrace or in the lounge room, then start the evening by grabbing a cheap meal and some drinks at the bar downstairs. Head out and experience all the buzzing nightlife options nearby, or stick around at The Lansdowne and dance the night away to a live band! You can also choose to be your own chef and use the shared kitchen to cook up a storm! 

Note: The Rooftop and Lounge are open from 7AM-10PM, the kitchen is open 24/7.

AGE LIMIT: 18-35

houseRules.notes:
* All standard bookings come with free cancellation until 24 hours before check in (2PM). Standard bookings will be charged on arrival

* No shows and cancellations within 24 hours of check-in are subject to being charged the cost of the first night's stay

* The hostel reserves the right to cancel the entire reservation of a no show guest if they have not arrived by 2AM on the day after check-in date.

* A valid credit/debit card and ID must be presented on check-in.

* A 2% surcharge applies on all EFTPOS, credit and debit card transactions.

* While we make the greatest effort to place all guests of a single booking into the same room, this is not always possible. To avoid having a group split up, book well in advance.

* We cannot guarantee the same room for the duration of your stay, as existing bookings may make this impossible. We try our best to avoid moving guests around, however in order to guarantee this please book well in advance.

* No refund policy. Payment made towards all bookings can only be obtained in the form of booking credit for any nights cancelled. Credit cannot be issued or used for the period 24th December â€“ 2nd January (inclusive) and a guest must contact info@thelansdownehotel.com.au to receive their credit voucher, it will not be issued automatically.

*Credit vouchers are issued at the discretion of The Lansdowne Hotel staff and are subject to additional terms and conditions (issued on creation of credit voucher).

* This hostel operates under a self-check in system. Guests will receive instructions and details about checking in. Please monitor your email for all communication from the Hostel. 

* We will not check you in if the cost of the reservation has not been paid in full.

* Please note for bookings of 8 or more guests, different policies or procedures may apply.

* Towels are available from reception for an extra charge and a refundable deposit.

* Laundry facilities can be used at an additional charge

* Age Restrictions apply. Minimum Age: 18, Maximum Age: 35

*Any common area including the Rooftop, Kitchen and Lounge Area are subject to close without notice. Usual opening hours for the rooftop and lounge are 7AM-10PM and are subject to change without notice.

* Christmas/New Year: All bookings with a stayover or check-in between 24th December - 2nd January (inclusive) will be charged in full on 1st December. Declined payment will result in cancellation of the reservation. Payments made for bookings during this period are non-refundable and non-transferable. A 2% card surcharge applies.

* By staying at The Lansdowne Hotel, all guests agree to the house rules and will adhere to them throughout their stay. The House Rules are available on our website and on request.
